attributes.action: Stop ITV from having rights to any sporting events.
attributes.additional_details:
It is time for ITV to no longer cover any sporting events.

ITV for years have bought the rights to major sporting events:

- Football matches (World Cup, Champions League, FA Cup, etc).
- Rugby.
- Cycling.


It is common knowledge that the British public are disappointed by their coverage consistently. It is time then for the media rights for sporting events to forthwith be revoked for ITV.

Let the disappointment and poor coverage stop.
